title: A Social Network without
content:
A Social Network without

30 June 2020, 5:20 am

Imagine a social network without advertisement

That doesn’t profile you

With no Likes or Followers

Without distraction machinery to make you crave for more



What you have left is what really matters, your own stories, your own memories, your own connections.
